text: The Nigerian Civil War was a civil war fought between the government of Nigeria and the Republic of Biafra. "Food was cut off from the 13 million inhabitants of Biafra"; Furthermore, "At the height of the war, an estimated 10,000 people (including 6,000 children) died from starvation every day".https://www.concern.net/news/hunger-as-a-weapon-of-war-timeline. Retrieved 2023-08-09 ==Notes== ==References== Category:Civil wars involving Africa Category:20th century in Nigeria Category:1960s conflicts Category:1970s conflicts
title: Nigerian Civil War
